text: Central Connecticut State University is a public university in New Britain, Connecticut. The university has about 12,315 students. It was founded in 1849. The current president of the university is Jack Miller. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Blue Devils. They have 14 varsity teams and they compete in the Northeast Conference. ==Other websites== *Central Connecticut State University's Official website *Central Connecticut Blue Devils' Official athletics website Category:Northeast Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Connecticut Category:1849 establishments in the United States
title: Central Connecticut State University
